assetProfile.address2: No. 2, Dr. P.V. Cherian Crescent Egmore
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: The KCP Limited engages in the cement, heavy engineering, power generation, and hospitality businesses in India and Vietnam. It operates through Cement unit, Engineering Unit, Power Generation unit, and Hotel segments. The company manufactures and sells cement; a range of heavy equipment for various industries, such as cement, sugar, power, mining (minerals), mineral processing, metal, oil and gas, chemicals and fertilizers, defense, space, industrial gases, and general engineering. In addition, it operates a 30 MW power co-generation plant in Son Hoa, Vietnam and sells it to the National Grid in Vietnam. Further, the company manufactures sugar; and operates Mercure Hyderabad KCP hotel in Hyderabad, India. The KCP Limited was founded in 1941 and is based in Chennai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. V. L. Indira Dutt B.A.
companyOfficers.title: Chairperson & MD
